SEARCH
Package com.example.app

Class ProductUsage.InventoryUsageData

java.lang.Object
com.example.app.ProductUsage.InventoryUsageData
Enclosing class:
ProductUsage
public static class ProductUsage.InventoryUsageData extends Object
Represents detailed usage data for a single inventory ingredient.

Stores comprehensive consumption metrics including product name, quantity used, unit of measurement, pricing information, total cost, order count, and average usage per order. This data is used to populate the usage table and generate visualization charts for inventory analysis.

  • Constructor Details

    • InventoryUsageData

      public InventoryUsageData(String productName, double quantityUsed, String unit, double pricePerUnit, double totalCost, int ordersUsedIn, double avgPerOrder)
      Constructs a new InventoryUsageData object with complete usage metrics.
      Parameters:
      productName - the name of the ingredient
      quantityUsed - the total quantity used
      unit - the unit of measurement
      pricePerUnit - the cost per unit
      totalCost - the total cost for all usage
      ordersUsedIn - the number of orders using this ingredient
      avgPerOrder - the average quantity per order
